testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and validate results
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart landing page.....................................passed When User searched for "Cucumber" vegetable.................................passed Then "Cucumber" results are displayed.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and then move to checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart landing page.....................................passed When User searched for "Brinjal" vegetable..................................passed And Added items to the cart.................................................passed And User proceeded to Checkout page for purchase............................passed Then Verify selected "Brinjal" items are displayed in Check out page........passed
